name: Celebrate 100 Years of the National Park Service!
description: Celebrate the hundredth year anniversary of the national park service! Contains several mini-events, speakers, performances, and shows.

name: Veteran's Day Free Admission!
description: Free admission on this national holiday!

name: Yellowstone Ski Festival!
description: Come to yellowstone for the Ski Festival! Ski with thousands of other festival-goers, from beginner to expert! Get coaching from ski experts, ski with your friends, and have a great time!
